text: Claudine is a 1974 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by John Berry and starring James Earl Jones and Diahann Carroll in her Oscar nominated role, Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs, Roxie Roker. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1970s romantic comedy movies Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1974 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies directed by John Berry Category:African-American movies
title: Claudine (movie)
